positive_examples: This is an example of chaotic system.
The chaotic system demonstrated clear characteristics.
We observed chaotic system in this context.
A typical case of chaotic system would involve these features.
The concept of chaotic system applies here.
A dynamical system that exhibits sensitive dependence on initial conditions and unpredictable long-term behavior.
negative_examples: This is an example of multi stable system, not chaotic system.
This represents dynamical system in general.
The document was filed in the cabinet.
She walked to the store to buy groceries.
training_hints.disambiguation: Not to be confused with: MultiStableSystem, or other types of DynamicalSystem

definition: A dynamical system exhibiting sensitive dependence on initial conditions and apparent randomness.
